conversation.content: Oh hey! So I've got—wait, let me just—I've got this coffee maker I need to return.
Um, okay, absolutely, I can, uh, definitely help you with that return today, um, let me just pull up our system here and, er, we'll get this sorted out for you right away, don't worry.
Great, you guys are always so helpful! I bought—no actually ordered it—ordered it online.
Um, that's perfect, so, uh, if you have your order number that would be, um, really helpful, but if not I can, er, look it up by your email or, uh, phone number, whatever works best.
Sure, it's um, let me find—oh wait here—order number JKR-4492-NM88.
Okay so, um, I've got order JKR-4492-NM88 here and, uh, I can see the coffee maker was delivered, er, let me just check the date here, um, looks like November 3rd, is that right?
Yeah that sounds about right! Been meaning to return it but you know how life gets.
Oh absolutely, um, I totally understand, so, er, the thing is—and I'm, uh, really sorry about this—our return window is, um, thirty days, and we're at, er, let me see, forty-seven days now.
Wait really? I thought—no that can't—oh man, I'm such an idiot, sorry!
No no no, um, please don't apologize, this happens, uh, all the time actually, and, er, let me just, um, see what options we might have here because, uh, I want to help if I can.
Um, yeah I just, uh, kept putting it off and, er, now I feel terrible bothering you with this.

Um, you know what, that's actually, er, kind of interesting because I'm seeing here in your account RCP-4492-U that, um, you've been a customer for, uh, wow, eight years, never had a return issue before.
Ha! Yeah I'm basically—wait no actually—I order everything from you guys!
So, um, here's what I'm thinking, and, er, this is a little unusual but, uh, given your history with us, um, let me check with my supervisor real quick about maybe doing a one-time exception?
Oh that would be—I mean if you can't—totally understand if that's not possible!

Um, okay so, er, good news, my supervisor just approved a, uh, special return authorization code SRA-8827-XK for you, um, even though we're past the window, so we can, er, definitely process this return.
Are you serious? Oh my god, you're literally the best! This is why I love you guys!
Aw, um, that's so nice to hear, really, so, uh, I'm sending you a return label now to your email, and, er, just use authorization code SRA-8827-XK when you ship it back.
Perfect! Hey sorry again for being—you know—such a procrastinator about this!
Um, honestly don't even, uh, worry about it, like I said this happens, er, all the time, and, um, that's what we're here for, to help however we can, okay?

scenario: trying to return an item past the return window
